Título: YouTube Music: Open the world of music. It's all here.
Descripción:
Get the new YouTube Music app: 
Android: https://play.google.com/store/apps/details?id=com.google.android.apps.youtube.music
iOS: https://itunes.apple.com/app/youtube-music/id1017492454

Try it on web: https://music.youtube.com

Introducing YouTube Music, a new music streaming service with the magic of YouTube to bring it all to life.  The official audio, official video, playlists and artist stations. Plus, the rest of the story you can’t find anywhere else: live performances, remixes and covers.
 
Open the world of music. It's all here.

Follow @youtubemusic:
https://twitter.com/youtubemusic
https://www.instagram.com/youtubemusic

YouTube Music is available to everyone in the U.S, Australia, New Zealand, Mexico and South Korea,* Austria, Canada, Finland, France, Germany, Ireland, Italy, Norway, Russia, Spain, Sweden, and the United Kingdom.

*YouTube Music Premium is $9.99 per month and YouTube Premium is $11.99 per month for individual memberships in the U.S. Pricing and Family Plan availability varies by country. South Korea will only offer YouTube Premium at the current price of YouTube Red.

YouTube music is included in YouTube Premium! 

With YouTube music membership, you can Download songs, Listen to YouTube Music in the locked screen, Over 100 million songs From Any Country. 4.6 rating (high) from 74K ratings in Apple Store! Continue watching to learn why YouTube Music has such a high rating. 

When logging in to YouTube music, make sure to enter your Gmail ID that has the YouTube Premium!

Home page has useful Shortcuts. Learn to Download Playlist, Add to library, Write comments or view other people's comments, play Without unlocking. 

From the lock screen, you can Pause, Play, Move to any time, Next Song, Previous Song.  

If you really like a song from a mixed playlist, then you could easily find the album of that song! 

To quickly find your Saved Playlists, History, Downloads, etc., go to "Library"! 

Listening history is a great place to check all of your recently played songs. 

Disclaimer: Background music is not from YouTube Music app but from the Audio library of YouTube Studio. Alternative music is used to avoid copyright violation.
